website_summaries.verdict: The perfect pick for customers seeking a compact carrier specializing in small-pet safety.
pros: Tight-wrap design ensures your pet feels secure and comforted
Includes collar hook for animal's safety
Material is airy and machine washable
An excellent fit for teacup-sized pets
cons: Many owners had issues keeping the zippers in place

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product a negative 20 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a negative 20 stars I would. The zipper does not hold properly and the little cheap piece of Velcro that they put on this thing would not hold an ant. My 16 week old Cavalier was able to open the zipper and fell out and is mow DEAD !!!!. Don’t buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful and cute to carry my little 2 pound Yorkie ...
customer_reviews.text: So useful and cute to carry my little 2 pound Yorkie who does not want to get away from me. Its a little big but i put a little padding in the bottom of the bag and it does the trick. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: DGR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for you and your pet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4 pound 6 ounce Chihuahua (3 years old). He was a little skeptical at first but after using it a few times around the house he is doing well. Comfortable strap for shoulder and some thin padding for support on the bottom of pouch for your pet. The phone pouch on the strap isn't large enough for my Samsung Note 8, but I could use it for a set of keys.
customer_reviews.author: ryanez

customer_reviews.title: Crappy velcro, narrow strap pocket. Everything else is great!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I expected. I have carried 3 different rabbits in it, probably 5 different times and the Velcro is already losing it's firm hold. Despite the lack of firm grip of Velcro it's worked quite well!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag unzips when I put my do in. He is only 6 lbs. and it would not support him like the picture. I put him in the bag while he was on the counter then picked him up with my head through the sling and my dog fell out with his head still attach because it has the draw string at the top. It was a disaster. I didn't try it out until after it was too late to return it. Do not buy it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Its very convenient and keeps our pup right where we want her
customer_reviews.text: Although it is breathable in some parts of the sling it doesn't allow enough ventilation during warm weather. Took our 4 pound Chihuahua pup to an outdoor function that had shade coverings over the entire top yesterday, temp outside was around 95 and she got too hot and uncomfortable. The heat inside the sling is compounded by the person carrying the dogs own body weight because of how it works.. I think more mesh and less plastic or a removable insert for summer months.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: Good material and quality but it runs very very small! Also the opening for the dogs head is a bit tight-unless you have a toy bread 5 pounds or under and not very long I do not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Zipper doesn’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: First one I ordered, the zipper wouldn’t stay closed so I ordered a replacement. Unfortunately the replacement carrier also has a zipper that won’t stay closed. I’m certainly not going to risk my pet falling out, so I’ll be looking for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Me

customer_reviews.title: This product is superb!
customer_reviews.text: This product is superb! It fits him so well and it’s so comfortable he doesn’t even try to get out there’s plenty a room and even though he weighs about 3 pounds there’s lots of room for him to grow if he needs to. It’s just a wonderful product and now I take him everywhere because it just works so well. I would buy it again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: gayle d gossard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent doggie pouch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I do like this doggie bag but wish there was slightly more support at the bottom for her. I tend to support her feet with my arm. Overall we both love it and since my Daisy is getting older it’s a great way to take her around everywhere I go. No the sizing is a bit misleading. Daisy is 6 lb so by the sizing chart I ordered medium. When it came it was way too big. I sent it back and got the small and it fits much better as she can keep her head out the intended hole.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for both-great wide straps
customer_reviews.text: I think they like a little bit as much as me...I didn’t think it was gonna to fit my 6 lbs chihuahua Zoey but it did. She enjoys it so much. She’s is a ESA and I won’t have to carry her in a bag. She can be close and I look forward to riding 🚲 with the dogs 🐕 with this sling!
customer_reviews.author: She is Private

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this carrier...When Theodore Roosevelt was 2lbs he fell out the neck opening,but he grew in and out of the carrier. Theodore loves his carrier so much that he gets it so I can hold him while washing dishes. Even though Theodore Roosevelt is 8lbs now he can still fit in the XS carrier, but mommy is going to buy him a M for comfort. This carrier is well made and worth EVERY penny!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, sturdy sling! Easy to put on, comfy for my pet, easy to clean. I sincerely recommend it. I am 5ft tall, if I pull the cord to the shortest mode, the pouch levels with my belly (great belly cover, lol). My pet feels very comfy and secure and he almost doesn't want to get out. :) Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Escape proof, place to sleep.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is my tiny chihuahua's safe place. He enjoys being carried around and often refuses to get out of it when I put him down. He falls asleep in it like a swaddled baby! After his neuter and dental surgery. This came in handy to keep him from messing with his stitches. If you have a little dog that likes to hide, they may enjoy this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: kj808

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and waste of money.....
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea and such an amzing idea but it was very poor quality! The zipper was easily ripped open when I tried to close it last week. Such a disappointment and huge waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf6+InTx

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, lousy execution
customer_reviews.text: The bag doesn't sit as high on your body as in the picture, so my poor dog bounces on my hip when I walk. The zipper is at the top of the blue panel, doesn't lock, and the flimsy Velcro closure isn't worth diddly squat, so be careful your dog doesn't fall out! The opening for your dog's head doesn't stay adjusted, because there's not enough tension.
customer_reviews.author: athnam

customer_reviews.title: STRANGULATION WARNING
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful. Its inside cord/clip attachment nearly strangled my tiny Morkie the first time she used it. As advertised, I used the cord/clip to keep her from jumping out. After a short time in this, she moved so that the cord was up against her neck & strangling her. I frantically removed her from the sling & haven't used it since. Maybe it would be fine without using that cord/clip but I still haven't recovered from that episode. I did buy a FurryFido sling $15 at HomeGoods & that's worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately It's Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a neural rating. The product itself is well made and looks to be very comfortable. Unfortunately its just too small for my 6 lb Chiweenie and the next size up is too big. I would not recommend it for any animal over about 4 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of drawstring.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 6 lbs and he barely fits. Inside is kind of flimsy but the part that is scariest is the draw string to tight around the head. I am afraid that he could he tangled and choke on it. I do like the way I can carry him in it and he does like being in it.
customer_reviews.author: jennabellesmom

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, secure and comfy for my 4-pound dog. It's actually a litte roomy for her, so I think as long as your pup is under 10 pounds, it would be a great fit! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. W. Kemerly

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. It cannot be safely nor conveniently used for any living being larger than an amoeba. There is no breadth nor solidity to the "floor" so the pet cannot stand properly; there is no balance to the entire unit, so it can tip over while across your shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Tiny Dog - Home Alone No Longer!
customer_reviews.text: Scooter used to have to stay at home when we took our bigger dogs for a walk. No longer! Now he rides comfortably in his Sling Carrier and is part of the pack wherever we go.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ragen Green's Perspective

customer_reviews.title: Good for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: The carrier does a good job of securing the Yorkie. Only wish would be for it to be able to be worn on either shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: E. Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Way too small, not as advertised :(
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 7lb Chihuahua is tiny and she didn’t fit. It’s way too small and unless you’re TOY dog is starved, no way he/she is going to be happy. Packed like sardines!
customer_reviews.author: Bajowa Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter's cat, so she can take it with her outside. The cat fits perfectly, seems to actually feel safe in there, and it is very comfortable for my daughter as well. Great purchase, fast shipping...everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Arek Petrosian

customer_reviews.title: As seen on site... :)
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and exactly as described...arrived on time and I have no complaints about either. Very delighted would purchase from them again...
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cat shuffles around in it, but it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Just get one size bigger from the size of your little one
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother he has a small dog. I wish I could of got it a bigger size it was way to small
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: Dog carrier
customer_reviews.text: Hard to get my dog in. She is a small poodle.
customer_reviews.author: brenda snider

customer_reviews.title: Weekend trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought for travel. Dog weighs 4lbs... dont imagine it would work for a dog much bigger
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toy breeds and is comfortable for pup and wearer both!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we were looking for! It keeps our puppy safe, is comfortable and hangs just where my hubby wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great carrier
customer_reviews.text: Is a great carrier for small animals. Using for a therapy rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Our little Chihuahua does not mind being in it as ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little Chihuahua does not mind being in it as long as it is not to hot.Otherwise he likes sleeping in it...
customer_reviews.author: US male shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for small dog!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this carrier! My chihuahua is only 2lbs so finding something that is small enough has been a challenge. The neck opening can be adjusted to fit her tiny size. I do have to put a soft blanket in the bottom so she can lay down and still see out. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: A D Wright

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a 9 pounds cat.
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Can't fit a 9 pounds cat. Good for kittens I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Severo

customer_reviews.title: Works great and my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great way to have a hands free dog carrier. Dog can be clipped in, and is snuggled nice and close to you.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great dog product
customer_reviews.text: This dog sling is great. My dog has a bad leg so this works great..
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Klingsporn

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for a larger size pet.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2lb 9oz teacup poodle, full time service dog and she loves it as much as I do, having her right at my chest but keeping my hands free is perfect. Thank you so much for a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: Pure24KaratGold

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than description
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the pet sling. The description stated for a small dog, however what I recieved had a "L" sticker on it. It is so big that if I had 3 Yorkies they would all fit. Shipping was extremely slow also.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Engelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Love the warm feel of my pup on my chest
customer_reviews.text: My little London loves going bye bye in this and I love control. He’s my service dog but I don’t trust him yet
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wish my kitten liked this but she does not.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Claypool

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for my new small Yorkie pup. Only wish it had a back strap to make it a bit more secure on my torso.
customer_reviews.author: twd11

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It is not proportioned right. My kitten is used to this type of handling and carrying but he hated this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zipper like to slide open sometimes if dog moves too much
customer_reviews.author: kayla pace

customer_reviews.title: Nice sling
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sling. We have only used it once but it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Salhip

customer_reviews.title: Not the best/not the worst
customer_reviews.text: it seemed to come dirty and possible used. has some threads loose
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice material havnt used it long so we will see if zippers hold up and can be washed ok
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Well made but...
customer_reviews.text: While the product is very well made but the sizing I found small. It wont fit my little chihuahua
customer_reviews.author: Lw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is only 4 pounds. It's hard to get anything that fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carrier
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Thx so much for providing such a useful product!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog sling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our little blind senior Maltese so he could join the other dogs in our walks. It worked out great, he loves it, it’s not uncomfortable for me at all, and it was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Usyk

customer_reviews.title: Small dog sling carrier
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is kind of hard to get him in it. He is so hyper
customer_reviews.author: Ione

customer_reviews.title: Pet carrier
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mage very well. Unfortunately I haven’t used it yet because I have a micro yorkie and it’s to big for him. I hope to use it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ornella sansotta

customer_reviews.title: The safety catch hooks to harness so hands free.
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My 2lb yorkie fits nicely with room to grow(?) Maybe. He's comfortable when he's in it and I'm power walking for 2+ miles. Well made, easy to clean. I recommend fo tiny dogs/puppies/cats/kittens.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates me now but I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Geezydallas

customer_reviews.title: The lil pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Little 4.3 lb chihuahua fits perfect inside the pack and ge loves to jump right in! Great product! I will buy again and will also definitely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Stephlea33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfy to wear and my 4.5lb Yorkie seems to be pretty at ease sitting in it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B Wiggs

customer_reviews.title: Hands free puppy caring
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Stella really seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlene D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a 4 to 5 pound dog.
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a puppy and the person wearing the dog bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: You'll get a lot of compliments from strangers on this cute little kangaroo pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable for me and my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, my dog loves it! Super comfortable good padding for your shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Tahari S. D'elvecchio

customer_reviews.title: pet sling
customer_reviews.text: I just enjoy using this for my new puppy and he snuggles right down in it. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Row

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing weight
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate weight accommodation. My 6 # maltese barely fit in this sling.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. The strap is just right, not bulky. My dog was relaxed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cuddlissimo! Pet Sling Carrier for Cats Dogs (Blue)
